name: nr1-nerdlet-zero-to-hero
title: New Relic One Custom Apps Zero to Hero Course
shortDescription: A self-paced introduction to custom application development for New Relic One.
description: A self-paced introduction to custom application development for New Relic One. This course is designed to teach you the fundamentals of how to build your own complex applications to run on the platform from scratch. During the course you will build a sample application using custom components learning key concepts throughout. The chapters are intended to be worked through in turn, each builds upon the work of the previous.

website.title: New Relic One Custom Apps Zero to Hero Course
